name: Mecha Mayhem (Rodii)
description:
Hired by a robotics company, you work as a trainee robot repairwoman. Your job would be easy as pie if it weren’t for your obnoxious boss, the hostile work environment, and the tight as hell deadlines…

Rush through 4 levels in this 2d platformer including various mini-games. Will you be able to rebuild the robots in time?

Controls : 
Left : A or Q
Right : D
Jump : Space
Use : E
Pause : ESCAPE
Mouse needed !

Team:

  • Rodi - Programming
  • Lakkar - Level design & Music
  • Stephy - Art - https://www.instagram.com/stephy.illu/
  • Nhuns - Art - https://www.instagram.com/nhuns_inkart/
